tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE training_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    input_data TEXT,
    output_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE models (
    model_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name TEXT,
    model_type TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE model_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    metric_name TEXT,
    metric_value FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE training_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    model_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TrainingRecord ( 
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_id INT, 
    dataset_id INT, 
    train_date DATE, 
    accuracy FLOAT, 
    loss FLOAT 
);

CREATE TABLE Hyperparameters ( 
    hyperparam_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_id INT, 
    learning_rate FLOAT, 
    batch_size INT, 
    epochs INT 
);

CREATE TABLE EvaluationMetrics ( 
    eval_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    model_id INT, 
    precision FLOAT, 
    recall FLOAT, 
    f1_score FLOAT 
);
